title: Alabama Beef Systems Videos: How to Collect a Hay Sample

tasks.task: Collecting and Analyzing Hay Samples for Nutritional Value
subtasks: Borrow forage probe from county extension office
Operate forage probe with electric drill
Collect 15-20 core samples from each hay lot
Insert probe at 90-degree angle into bale (for round: curved side; for square: center end)
Remove probe, empty contents into mixing bucket
Create subsample by filling 1-quart bag at least half full
Submit sample and form to nearby certified forage testing laboratory
Use report to create livestock supplementation plan
Consult extension agent for assistance in management practices
Visit Alabama Extension website for additional information
